description:
When you love what you see but are not sure if it is the right choice, then opt for a Gift Certificate from Luxurious Wedding Accessories.

Our Gift Certificates can be applied to any item in our collection.

Simply select the amount you wish to Gift from our pull down menu.  Upon check out, fill in the information of the persons you would like it applied to in the "instructions" section.  Please give us their email too, if available.

Please note that once payment is made, we have a no refund policy.

All Gift Certificates must be applied to merchandise on Luxurious Wedding Accessories.com.

Luxurious Wedding Accessories Gift Certificates are not redeemable for cash or credit.

name: Corina Bridal Minaudiere Egg Purse
description: The Corina Bridal Minaudiere Purse from Luxurious Wedding Accessories is part of our Egg Minaudiere Collection of real Egg Purses which are customized, adorned and embellished in any way your heart desires. Bill Me Later Payment Option Available As a bridal accessory, a Minaudiere is considered an important jewelry piece intended to substitute for an evening bag. The Minaudiere became a beloved accessory for women during the Deco period of the 1930's. Its original design is attributed to Van Cleef & Arpels. Our Corina Egg Minaudiere Purse follows in that tradition and is hand made and designed by a gifted American artisan. From an exquisite Emu Egg which has been treated to give it strength, color, refinement and beauty a true work of art emerges. Order as seen in the image or request any color you desire. The lovely Emu Egg is adorned with crystals and interesting design to make this a bridal accessory to treasure forever. Can be used as a Ring Presentation box for your ceremony and then switched to your bridal purse. Later it can be displayed and used as a jewelery box. Sized at approximately 6 inches tall and fourteen and 14 1/2 inches in circumference. It comes with an attached gold plated 22 inch arm chain. It will fit your lipstick, credit cards and other small items. The inside is lusciously lined with velvet and opens to display a beveled mirror. Email us with your custom requests or questions: accessories@luxuriouswedding.com Luxurious Wedding Recommends... using your Corina Egg Minaudiere Purse as the 'something Blue' tradition. Recommended Use: Ring Presentation Box Bridal Purse Gift for Maid of Honor Gifts for Mother of Bride and Groom Gift for a Bride Jewelry Box The Corina Bridal Minaudiere Purse comes with a gold plated stand attached to the bottom to prop it in an upright position. At your reception, you can display it on your bridal table. Custom made just for you. Please allow 4-6 weeks. One of a Kind. Made to Order. Final Sale. No Returns. Shipping within the USA will be billed separately. Charges for international shipping will be determined and billed separately. Because we only accept a limited number of designs each month, we recommend you secure your design date as soon as possible. Once payment has been processed, your design request will be put into our production schedule. 4-6 weeks lead time requested. Please note that all Luxurious Wedding Accessories are custom made just for you. No Egg Purses are exactly the same but will closely represent the style featured. We can tailor the design by adding one of your favorite brooches or using your wedding dress fabric as the background or creating it in any color combination of your choice. The images we display are from previous client requests. Your Corina Bridal Minaudiere Purse will be similar in feeling. By placing your order you acknowledge, agree and accept that all our products fall under a no refund and a no cancellation policy. All sales are final. name: Juliet Minaudiere Bridal Purse
description: Our Juliet and Julieta Minaudiere Bridal Purses from Luxurious Wedding Accessories are a true show stopper and everlasting keepsake. They can be used as the Ring Presentation Box for the ceremony and converted to your Bridal Purse for the reception. Roomy enough for a lipstick and other small essentials. The top opens up to reveal a beveled mirror to keep your beauty in check. After the wedding use as a jewelery box and a purse for any special occasion. Bill Me Later Payment Option Available The Juliet and the Julieta Bridal Purses differ only slightly. Designed by the world renowned artisan, Vivian Alexander, they are lined with sand washed silk and include the Vivian Alexander hallmark beveled mirror and a mesh rope wrist chain. These elegant purses of Vivian Alexander are made of pure silver and enamel which is embellished with a design outlined in Swarovski Crystals. Size: Five and one half inches tall and four and one half inches in diameter. The Vivian Alexander Minaudieres start as an engine turned, guilloche, pure silver shell. The armature is five and one half inches tall and the locking bezel is four inches across. To this is added the enamel, swirls and crystals. It is a slow process, all by hand, but the results are a true masterpiece. Made in the USA, using fine silver, Swarovski crystals or gemstones, and translucent enamel. Each Vivian Alexander purse is of the highest quality and highly revered in the world of fashion. Vivian Alexander has created unique evening purses for over twenty years. His mother was an impressionist painter, well known for her dramatic colors and compositions. The first purses made by Alexander were created with an ostrich egg shell, leading him to produce sculptures along the lines of the famous Faberge Imperial Russian Easter Eggs. Alexander’s work attracted the attention of the Forbes family, until recently the keeper of the world’s finest and most extensive Faberge collection, started by Malcolm Forbes. Alexander was commissioned to create replicas of the most valuable sculptures in the collection. For seven years he worked with the Forbes Museum curator to master the ancient art of enameling and the use of guilloche on precious metals. His enameling work was noted by Christopher Forbes to be the best in the United States. As a bridal accessory, a Minaudiere is considered an important jewelry piece intended to substitute for an evening bag. The Minaudiere became a beloved accessory for women during the Deco period of the 1930's. Its original design is attributed to Van Cleef & Arpels. Our Juliet and Julieta Minaudiere Purse follow in that tradition. Order as seen in the image or request any color you desire. You can have it made with real gemstones. We can also create a custom design for you.
